item.description:
Rational Mysticism: Dispatches from the Border Between Science and Spirituality

Available on Kindle!!

http://www.amazon.com/Psychopath-Test-Journey-Through-Industry/dp/1594488010

You don't have to FINISH the book to attend. Many people end up getting half way through a book and still show up and get something out of the conversation... and there probably won't be any spoilers.

See you there!

LOCATION CHANGE: We are meeting at Characters Bar and Grill. It has a lot of tables and is located just outside the exit of the Kendell/MIT stop on the redline. I have also moved to time to 6pm, but feel free to come as your schedule allows.
item.how_to_find_us: Entrance is next to the Marriot directly at the Kendall/MIT T stop.
item.name: Book and Brew: "Rational Mysticism"
